sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO tb_board (unq , title , pass , name , content , hits , rdate ) VALUES (board_seq.nextval , #title# , #pass# , #name# , #content# , 0 , sysdate )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT b.* FROM( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT unq , title , name , content , hits , to_char(rdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate FROM tb_board
WHERE UPPER($search$) like UPPER('%$searchText$%')
ORDER BY unq DESC ) a ) b WHERE
rn >= #startIndex# and rn <= #endIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) total FROM tb_board
WHERE UPPER($search$) like UPPER('%$searchText$%')
SELECT unq , title , name , content , to_char(rdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate FROM tb_board WHERE unq = #unq#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE tb_board SET hits=hits+1 where unq=#unq#
UPDATE tb_board SET title = #title# ,name=#name# ,content=#content# WHERE unq='$unq$'
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_board WHERE unq=#unq# and pass=#pass#
